articles.description: On the audio app Clubhouse, Elon Musk asked Vlad Tenev why the Robinhood stopped users from trading so-called meme stocks.
articles.content:
The GameStop stock saga took a new turn on Sunday night when Tesla CEO Elon Musk unexpectedly interviewed Vlad Tenev, the CEO of the trading app Robinhood, on the new audio app Clubhouse.
Robinhood … [+3226 chars]

articles.author: Asha Barbaschow
articles.title: Communications Minister touts the opportunities of a Google-less Australia - ZDNet
articles.description: Paul Fletcher said Microsoft is at the ready to replace Google Search with Bing in Australia, while Treasury pointed to the existence of codes in the dairy and sugar industries as justification for pushing forward with the Media Bargaining Code.
articles.content: Google last month threatened to pull its search engine from Australia if the Media Bargaining Code in its current form were to become law, but the prime minister and his army of ministers have said t… [+3851 chars]

articles.author: Tom Westbrook, Thyagaraju Adinarayan, Jeff Lewis
articles.title: Silver swept up by GameStop retail frenzy, prices soar - Reuters India
articles.description: A social media-driven buying spree lifted silver to an eight-year high on Monday, though prices later pared gains on doubts about the ability of retail traders that have been focused on stocks to sway prices in the bigger, more liquid commodity.
articles.content: LONDON/TORONTO (Reuters) - A social media-driven buying spree lifted silver to an eight-year high on Monday, though prices later pared gains on doubts about the ability of retail traders that have be… [+6124 chars]

articles.title: Silver spikes as retail buyers try squeeze play - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Silver futures (XAGUSD:CUR) are surging to open the week, popping as much as 7.4% to $28.99/oz. for the highest level since mid-August, after last week's Reddit-fueled rally lifted the...
